thread.title: One of Louisville's largest law firms names new partners
thread.title_full: One of Louisville's largest law firms names new partners

author: Carolyn Tribble Greer
title: One of Louisville's largest law firms names new partners
text: Enlarge Benjamin Lewis was elected a partner with Bingham Greenebaum Doll LLP law firm in… more One of Louisville's largest law firms has elected 11 new partners — including one in the firm's Louisville office. Bingham Greenebaum Doll LLP promoted the 11 from within the firm, effective Feb. 18, after the annual partners meeting in Louisville. Enlarge Benjamin Lewis was elected a partner with Bingham Greenebaum Doll LLP law firm in… more The Louisville attorney who was promoted is Benjamin Lewis , who focuses his practice on complex business litigation matters, particularly disputes involving breach of fiduciary duty claims against trustees, executors, directors, officers and other key employees. The other attorneys who were elected as partners, including their focus areas and city, are: Bradley Arnett , corporate and transactional, economic development, Cincinnati;
